text: @StateDept @SecPompeo @realDonaldTrump if you and trump cared about your people you’d behave in a different way. Exhibit A, coronavirus response. Exhibit B, the way you did not stand up for your people in the state department. And I could go on and on. So get off your moral high horse.  Not credible.
